news.content: Received Graduate Merit Scholarship (Awarded to top incoming graduate students) from Korea University.
Received Grand Prize (1st Place) in Capstone Design Project at SEOULTECH.
Presented research at SPARK 9th Poster Session ‚Äî received Best Poster 2nd Prize.
Received Full Scholarship for the best grades from SEOULTECH.
Received Gold Award at 2023 SEOULTECH Patent Camp.

gallery.description: Received Graduate Merit Scholarship (Awarded to top incoming graduate students) from Korea University
Received Grand Prize (1st Place) in Capstone Design Project at SEOULTECH.
Presented research at the SPARK 9th Poster Session. Engaged in interdisciplinary discussions with participants from diverse backgrounds. Won the grand prize (2nd place) as the best poster.
